Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 13 Parittattika » 13.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 13.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejāta
Parittattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejāta
47.
2006Parittaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho paritto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2007Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2008Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe appamāṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe… . (1)
<< Naadhipatiup Napacchājāta-naāsevana >>
